title: WTB: Ty Cobb (interested in a variety of cards)
author: T_Hamilton

posts.post_title: WTB: Ty Cobb (interested in a variety of cards)
posts.post_content:
Before blowing money at REA this weekend, I wanted to see what is out there.

I have about $3500 +/- to add a nice Ty Cobb to my collection.

Interested in any playing day Cobbs in PSA/SGC 1, 1.5, 2... also interested in Type I pictures of Cobb

Currently own the following so not interested in them:
T3
M110
T206 bat on and bat off
D304
Pinkerton Postcard
E90-1

DM works best. Thank you!
